page.title: 13Scouts W.Grove Denchworth
page.content: A scouting official came to school. We learned that while the numbers of scouts in G.B. is dropping due to a fall in birthrate, Grove Scout numbers have risen dramatically recently due to young families who have come to Grove to live. Another cub scout pack is to be formed in June, named Grove Kestrels. Other packs are the Hawks, Eagles and Falcons. Cub scouts are for boys aged 8 - 10.5 years. Two Beaver packs are also starting for boys aged 6-8 years. The two scout packs together have 45 members. Scouts are boys aged 10-16 years. The Grove Venture Scouts for boys and girls aged 16-21 years have 12 members. The Grove Scout Headquarters is situated in the Recreation Ground, so the packs have good facilities. Denchworth has only two cub scouts who have to go to West Hanney.
